description: This Dart file defines a Flutter widget named ControlBar, a stateless UI component providing controls for toggling sound effects, undoing moves, and restarting a game. It interacts with a GameProvider for state management and UI updates.

classes.name: ControlBar
classes.description: A stateless Flutter widget that provides control buttons for sound toggle, undo, and restart actions, interacting with GameProvider for game state management.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the ControlBar widget UI, including toggle for sound effects, undo button, and restart button, all wired to the game provider.
